ygData.subject: Hello?  Hello?
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow, just wondering if Santa Claws got all of the other Shadow Knights out there, or what?  I have not recd a digest since the 10th of Dec. and was wondering
ygData.messageBody:
Wow, just wondering if Santa Claws got all of the other Shadow Knights out there, or what? I have not recd a digest since the 10th of Dec. and was wondering what's up?

If anyone out there is getting this, what is a GOOD area for a 20th lvl DE SK to go and hunt? I have been hunting in HPH and getting good xps, but wondering where to go next. Also, has anyone *ever* gotten to the point where they were not KOS to the HP guards?

As an additional aside, I was wondering what the general consensus was on costs for the following items: Silvery-plated Bracer, Blackened Iron Armor (any piece or general guideline, like 5plat per AC or what?), BIBS, and Dark Reaver?

Is there anyone out there?
